body.name: YIOU Air Purifiers for Home Large Room up to 547 ft², H13 True HEPA Air Filter 20dB Air Cleaner Odor Eliminator for Allergies Smoke Dust Pollen, Black
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 19 hrs 54 mins
features: Adopted enhanced air duct system, YIOU air purifiers can purifiy up to 547 ft² room twice per hour and effectively block air-born pollution.

3-Stage True HEPA Filter: Consisted of pre-layer, H13 true HEPA layer and activated carbon layer, YIOU air filter can capture large airborne particles, and decompose unpleasant odors in turn to relief respiratory discomfort.[Please search B0972641SV for replacement filter.]

Visible Real-time Air Quality Indicator: Built in a high precision laser sensor, YIOU air purifiers for home will glow red/yellow/green to reveal poor/good/excellent air quality by detecting airborne particles as small as 0.3um.

Sleep within a Sound of Silence: For a halcyon and healthier sleep at night, YIOU air purifiers for bedroom can work at 20dB in sleep mode with the indicators half on or off and no buzz or beep. Using timer setting from 1-7 hours and child lock at the same time for better user experience.

Certificated Air Cleaner: Complying with Part 15 of the FCC rules, YIOU air purifier has a CADR of 140 CFM for smoke, 139 CFM for dust and 144 CFM for pollen, effective for wildfire smoke and allergies larger than 0.3 um
body.description: ☆The replaceable air filter is on sale! Please search B0972641SV for detail.☆ Each YIOU air purifier will be delivered with an original air filter which could be effective for 3 to 6 months. Purchasing a bundle of air purifier and air filter will receive one original filter and one optional filter.☆Note: Please do not use a voltage different to 110-120 V in case of damaging the device.☆

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 1, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for Cat Allergy Sufferers, Quiet Operating, Covers Large Area
reviews.reviewText: My wife has been suffering from allergic reactions (red, itchy, gunky eyes) to 4 cats that we recently adopted (we had never had cats before as adults), and putting a couple of these in ours house have helped with her cat allergies quite a bit. We put one of these in the fairly large "cat room" portion of the house, which is where the cats always stay, and one in our bedroom. Those two rooms also seem to be a lot less dusty now. The manufacturer recommends cleaning the filters twice a week, but we've found that cleaning them just once a week works well for us. The filters are very easy to pull out to clean. To clean them, I take the filters outside and brush them off (the top side only) with a fairly large, soft brush, which is quick and easy. The manufacturer says that you can also clean the filers by holding a vacuum cleaner hose near the filters to suck out all of the dust and particles, but they also give a brush cleaning option, and that works great for us.The instruction manual is simple, well-written, and easy to understand. It tells you everything you need to know about the unit. Things that I especially like about this air purifier: (1) It automatically senses how dirty the air is and automatically adjusts the fan speed accordingly; (2) It is extremely quite, even when the fan is running at high speed (we have one of these in our bedroom, and we sleep just fine with it on, and almost don't even notice that it's on); (3) It has a button lock feature that allows you to lock the buttons so that children or pets can't accidentally turn it off when you want it to keep running (very important in our "cat room"); (4) You can easily turn off the light inside the unit and dim the control button lights with one quick press of a button (especially good if you're using one in a bedroom like we are); (5) This unit is surprisingly small for an air purifier that works in a such a large area (which is another great feature of it), since it is effective in a room or area up to 547 square feet in size.This unit seems to be of high quality, and we expect these air purifiers to serve us well for a very long time. The manufacturer recommends replacing the filter about every 3 to 6 months. We've only had our units for a month, so we haven't had to replace the filters yet, BUT we did go ahead and order a couple of replacement filters so that we have them ready when we do need them. I would recommend that you do this also, since they seem to go out of stock from time to time. (SEE: https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B0972N3G4L/ref=ppx_yo_dt_b_asin_title_o01_s00?ie=UTF8&psc=1 )NOTE: If you have a power outage, even a brief power interruption that only lasts for about one second or so, these units will automatically turn off, and will still be off when the power comes back on, which means that you will have to turn them back on again after any power interruption. (We discovered this recently when we had a short power-off blip in our home.) So, it's always a good idea to check them from time to time (especially if you've been gone from home for a while) to make sure that they are still on, like you want them to be. This is easy to forget about doing, since they run so quietly.We are very pleased with these, and we highly recommend them.

reviews.reviewText: Very inexpensive, seems to be doing great with helping cut down on the pet dander and dust. Plus it is very quiet. Not sure how much of a pain in the butt it's going to be to get replacement filters yet?

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So far so good
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. It came packaged very well. Has lpw medium high and auto speed. Real sleek, I love the lights on the side. I wanted a bigger one and this is in fact a good size.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Silent and seems to work - despite filter poorly constructed I'm buying another of these!
reviews.reviewText: Long story short, I have 5 air purifiers in this house and this YIOU unit is the quietest (by far) and I am buying a second one right now after typing this review.The long story: I bought the highest rated filter on amazon (Levoit) but sadly it doesn't clean the air! I also have a large expensive model (Germ Guardian) but it makes a lot of noise and is not suitable for the bedroom. This YIOU unit was by FAR the quietest and this is why I am buying a second one - for the bedroom. One thing I noticed when taking the plastic off the filter (do not forget to do this) is how junky the construction of the filter was - the paper edging of it was falling apart - but that didn't seem to relate to the function of the thing so I am still buying another of these.
